title: Magical colorful cats (easy)
text: There is a circle with n cats, includes white cats, red cats and green cats. When two cats with different color talk with each other, they both change to third color. If they are same color, nothing will happen.At each step, the 1stcat talks with 2ndcat, the 2ndcat talks with the 3rdcat,… and the nthcat talks with 1stcat.Given the original color of n cats, your task is find the color of n cats after k steps.Input :-       First line : n and k (1 ≤ n ≤ 20000, 1 ≤ k ≤ 30000)-       Second line : n characters, the i-th charater denotes color of the i-th cat at first stateOutput :-       n characters denotes the color of n cats after k steps.Sample :Input :3 1GRROutput :RGRInput :5 4WRWRWOutput :GGGWGNote :After solved this problem, you may want to tryBLCATS
